oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mechanical performance of endodontically treated teeth
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JOSHI, S
MUKHERJEE, ABHIJIT
KHEUR, M
MEHTA, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: finite element method
stress concentration
computer aided design
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper aims at evaluating the mechanical performance of endodontically treated teeth. A three-dimensional finite element analysis of teeth is presented. The stress distribution in the teeth restored with a few variants of posts is compared. An improved design of the post is presented. A study on alternative materials for posts has been reported. Conclusions on the ideal shapes and materials of the posts are drawn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Finite Elements in Analysis and Design 37(8), 587-601
